      • setHomeCountry

        public void setHomeCountry(java.lang.String countryCode)
        Persistently store Home country, overwrites any existing country value. Changing the country automatically clears the cached service list and triggers a refresh.
        Specified by:
        setHomeCountry in interface com.philips.platform.appinfra.servicediscovery.ServiceDiscoveryInterface
        Parameters:
        countryCode - country code to persistently store, code must be according to ISO 3166-1

                                       com.philips.platform.appinfra.servicediscovery.ServiceDiscoveryInterface.OnGetServiceUrlListener listener)
        Returns the URL for a specific service with a preference for the current language.
        Specified by:
        getServiceUrlWithLanguagePreference in interface com.philips.platform.appinfra.servicediscovery.ServiceDiscoveryInterface
        Parameters:
        serviceId - name of the service for which the URL is to be retrieved
        listener - asynchronously returns using onSuccess the URL of the requested service; or returns onError the error code when retrieval failed.

      • getServicesWithLanguagePreference

        public void getServicesWithLanguagePreference(java.lang.String serviceIds,
                                     com.philips.platform.appinfra.servicediscovery.ServiceDiscoveryInterface.OnGetServicesListener listener)
        Returns the URLs + locales for a set of services with a preference for the current language.
        Specified by:
        getServicesWithLanguagePreference in interface com.philips.platform.appinfra.servicediscovery.ServiceDiscoveryInterface
        Parameters:
        serviceIds - list of service names for which the URL + locale are to be retrieved
        listener - asynchronously returns using onSuccess a map containing the requested service names (key) and their URL + locale (value), the value will be null if the service is unknown; or returns onError the error code when retrieval failed.

      • refresh

        public void refresh(com.philips.platform.appinfra.servicediscovery.ServiceDiscoveryInterface.OnRefreshListener listener)
        Start negotiation with cloud service for the list of service for this application. List is based on sector, microsite, home country, and language. The retrieved list is cached internally (not persistently). The cached list is automatically refreshed every 24hours. A refresh is only required, to ensure the very first service request after app start can be processed from the cache quickly, or when a previous sync failed.
        Specified by:
        refresh in interface com.philips.platform.appinfra.servicediscovery.ServiceDiscoveryInterface
        Parameters:
        listener - asynchronously returns using onSuccess when retrieval was successful; or returns onError the error code when retrieval failed.
